alert.note: Alert for Jack (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 13 at 5:20AM CST until December 13 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM CST FOR SOUTHERN JACK COUNTY... At 519 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles south of Bryson, or 13 miles east of Graham, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Fort Richardson State Park around 550 AM CST. Jacksboro around 555 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Bartons Chapel, Lost Creek Reservoir, Wizard Wells, Vineyard and Joplin. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
